+template <typename Index, typename Compare>
+void msd_radix_sort(uint32_t *left, uint32_t *right,
+                    Index index, Compare cmp) {
+    metric::timer tm(msd_radix_time);
+    msd_radix_sort(left, right, 0, index, cmp);
+}
